pengu.messenger

Class APICommunicator.Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • pengu.messenger.APICommunicator.Request
  • Enclosing class:
    APICommunicator

    public static class APICommunicator.Request
extends java.lang.Object
    A Request object is returned when a request is made to the API server.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        public Request(java.lang.String received,
               java.lang.String connectionStatus,
               boolean success,
               java.lang.String contentType)
        Parameterized constructor method for a Request object.
        Parameters:
        received - The String representation of what is received from the API server. It is the body of the HTTP response.
        connectionStatus - The String representation of a connection status, it could be an error status or a success status.
        success - A Boolean representation of the connection. TRUE means successful, FALSE means that an error occurred.
        contentType - The String representation of a HTTP MIME Type. E.g. application/json or image/png.
